'''Windblume Kamera''' is an event gadget from the event [[Windblume's Breath]] that is used in the [[Windblume's Breath/Breezy Snapshots|Breezy Snapshots]] subevent. It is obtained from the [[Event Quest]] ''[[Breezy Snapshots]]''.

It presents no special functions that differentiate it from the [[Kamera]] gadget.
